entry.string: Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password.
entry.translation: Проблема со входом: не правильный логин или пароль.

entry.string: Your account has been terminated by your request or at the adminstrator's discression.
entry.translation: Ваша учетная запись была удалена по Вашему запросу или решению администратора.

entry.string: Your account has been marked as inactive. Contact the adminstrator with further questions.
entry.translation: Ваша учетная запись деактивирована. Свяжитесь с администратором.

entry.string: Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. Your account has been locked for #(1) minutes.
Problem logging in: Invalid username or password. You have tried to log in #(1) times.
Your account has not yet been activated by the site administrator
entry.translation: Ваша учетная запись еще не активирована администратором сайта.
